about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: A wellness retreat in João Pessoa
about.description:
Mali Spa is a wellness retreat in beautiful João Pessoa. A space to promote balance between body and mind, where every detail has been designed to provide harmony, health, relaxation and vitality.

Our therapies combine massage techniques with attentive and present listening, respecting the unique rhythm of each person who arrives. We believe that true wellness is born from the deep connection between body, mind and spirit — and each session is a journey of reconnection with yourself.

items.author: Mariana Silva
items.text: Wonderful experience! The environment is welcoming and the professionals extremely attentive. The relaxing massage was perfect, I left feeling renewed.

items.author: Carlos Eduardo
items.text: Impeccable service! Mali Spa exceeded all my expectations. I highly recommend the Day Spa, worth every penny.

items.author: Juliana Costa
items.text: Amazing place to relax and take care of yourself. The therapists are very professional and the environment conveys peace and tranquility.

items.author: Ricardo Mendes
items.text: Best spa in João Pessoa! I went for the therapeutic massage and will definitely return. Excellent value for money.

items.author: Ana Paula Santos
